Articles.Content: I just got this game and started playing the first tutorial and was amazed with how TINY the font and UI is. I have a 27" 2560x1440 display, and this game looks like it'd be tough to play on even a 1920x1080 display. I saw a flight ui size slider, but that does nothing for every other part of the game and I haven't even gotten to a flight ui yet. This is a serious hindrance for myself (and many other people as just googling for a solution to this can attest). I'm surprised this hasn't been mentioned yet here, but a search of the forums yielded no results. A way to scale the entire UI or just fonts even would help a ton in making this game playable. There's no reason I should have to get closer than a foot away from my 27" monitor to be able to read all of the text.
Enhanced Navball I think lets you rescale the navball, there IS a GUI size option in the non-game settings menu but I'm not sure if it affects everything
